newsitem.title: USA: UPS gets $45 mln contract from Sprint PCS.
newsitem.headline: UPS gets $45 mln contract from Sprint PCS.

text.p: United Parcel Service of America Inc said on Monday its UPS Worldwide Logisitics unit signed a five-year, $45 million contract to manage the supply chain for Sprint PCS handset and accessories.
UPS Worldwide said it would manage the movement of handsets and accessories from original equipment manufacturer, or OEM, through delivery to Sprint PCS distributors and customers.
Sprint PCS is a partnership of Sprint Corp, Tele-Communications Inc, Cox Communications Inc and Comcast Corp.
The handsets are part of the digital wireless personal communication services, or PCS, network Sprint PCS is building. Sprint PCS technology provides portable telephone, voice mail, and caller ID.
